comment: Adding an existential quantifier in the antecedent and a universal quantifier in the consequent of an implication. Note that the half of the proof using the antecedent ` F/ x ph ` does not require ~ ax-gen . See also ~ 19.38a and ~ 19.38b . (Contributed by BJ, 27-Nov-2022.)
